back of a length outside off, he pulls the bat inside the line
very full, at the popping crease, comes off the toe end
another one down the leg side, a tumbling take from Dowrich
that's better, good length outside off, seams away, beats the bat by a long way and Dowrich grasses it
nicely bowled, back of a length at off stump, Cook plays across it slightly and it takes a thickish outside edge through backward point
a lovely cover drive from Cook, big stride forward than he plays on the up through the off side. Hold the pose on that one
pulls the length back, some seam movement from outside off, takes an inside edge behind square
short of a length, angled in from round the wicket, takes the thigh pad
back of a length outside off, left alone
at off stump, short of a length, defended
round the wicket, short outside off, goes for the cut and takes the bottom edge
back of a length at off stump, defended from deep in the crease, and they spot the chance for a quick single
inside the line, knocks a short ball into the leg side
well bowled, a short ball, takes Cook high on the bat
tucked away from off stump through midwicket
fuller, outside off, defended to mid-on
gets forward, pushes into the gap at cover
well bowled, jags back off the seam from outside off, Cook is off the ground when it strikes the pad
good length, defended into midwicket
full outside off, left alone
tight run! A full delivery defended into backward point, Blackwood the fielder...very close with a direct hit. Stoneman probably out
a rather half-hearted cut to a wider delivery, plays over the top of the ball
over the wicket, full outside off, and that's a very neat shot from Cook as he drives it straight of mid-on
back round the wicket, short of a length outside off, defended
full, wide outside off, left alone
gets forward to a fuller delivery, defended to point
fuller still, driven firmly into the pitch and back to the bowler
good length outside off, across his crease and defended
87 mph, back of a length and wide outside off, left alone
back of a length, slanted into the corridor. Squeezes it out to gully
full one at leg stump, holds his shape and taps this between wide mid-on and the non-striker
back of a length, angled in at the corridor. Off stump exposed as he lets this go
pokes at it outside off on the front foot, big inside edge onto pad before dribbling to mid-on
length at off stump, hangs in the crease and pushes it wide of mid-off

gets him first ball! Trapped in front of middle stump and he won't review. Good length at off stump, pushed through a bit flat. Rips off the surface and beats the inside edge as he presses forward. Looked very good and Erasmus thought so too
back of a length, flat and into the pads. Whipped past square leg
full at leg stump, defended into midwicket
length at off stump, defended to cover
length, pushed through at off. Tapped back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, left alone
good length, in at off stump. Nurdled past square leg off the inside half. Nearly beaten for pace
short and wide, left alone
good length at off stump, solidly defended to point
back of a length outside off, slants in but there's bounce on that. Left alone
good length at off stump, defended to cover
overpitched at middle stump. Flicks, slightly across the line. And it's 89.7mph, so he's late on it. Big turn of the bat as it comes off the toe, but he gets it to fine leg's left
back of a length, spinning into the pad. Whipped to long leg's left...where Shannon Gabriel lets it through with a lazy attempt low to his left and allows a third
short one at off stump, rocks back and uses the time he has to place the pull well wide of deep square
tossed up outside off, left alone
good length, off stump, blocked off the front foot
full at off stump, driven back to the bowler
short at off stump, can't get it wide of mid-off with the back foot punch
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
good length outside off, comes back in, but it's too wide to cause trouble. Left alone
short and wide outside off, slashes at it and nails the cut off the middle of the bat. Gets it wide of backward point
short, wide outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, whips it on the up but can't beat mid-on
back of a length, slanted across off stump, left alone
good length on the pads, keeps low but he watches it late, flicked to deep square
back of a length, slides through outside off. Pushed back down the pitch
good length at off stump, defended off the back foot
back of a length, angled across off. Chopped to sweeper cover

tossed up outside off, flicked towards mid-on...who takes on Stoneman at the strikers end after he starts late. Keeper blinded by the batsman running, can't gather this one that lands awkwardly in front of him. Slip has to put in some effort
good length at leg stump, flicked to midwicket
back of a length at middle stump, slight shape in. Tucked to midwicket
good length outside off, driven on the up down the pitch. Holder stretches his right hand to grab it
back of a length at off stump, defended back down the pitch off the back foot
is that dropped? Hard to tell. It seems to have fallen short of square leg. Yes it has. It's a short one and he gets good bat on the pull. Can't place it wide of that fielder
back of a length at off stump, draws him into feeling for it, beats the outside edge
length outside off, left alone
good length outside off, defended off the outside half
back of a length at leg stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length outside off, left alone
nicely floated for a drive outside off, but he crashes it straight back at the bowler
good length, angled in at off stump. Pushed to midwicket off the inside half
good length outside off, driven to sweeper on the up
good length at middle stump, pushed to mid-on on the rise
good length, slight movement away. Nicely covers the off stump as he lets it go
short and very wide, Dowrich collects in front of second slip
back of a length at off stump, solidly defended off the back foot
juicy outswinger, right in the cover drive zone. Doesn't take the bait. Left alone
full outside off, driven to mid-off
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
length at off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
full at middle stump, leans in to get to the pitch and neatly whips it past midwicket
once more. This time off the back foot. It's short on middle stump, he hangs deep in the crease and times the whip nicely to send this to the midwicket fence
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
full at leg stump, pushed to mid-on
back of a length at middle stump, poked to midwicket off the back foot
back of a length outside off, left alone
full at middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
good length at middle stump, watches it onto his pads, beams widely, flicks to the deep square boundary
good length outside off, left alone
short outside off, slapped straight to backward point
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
good length at off stump, forward block
full at off stump, thick inside edge as he looks to push into the covers
full at middle stump, forward defence
short one, skids through low outside off. Under-edge on the cut
back of a length outside off, left alone
tossed up at off stump, driven to mid-on
overpitched outside off, nicely forward and across to meet the pitch and then drive it past mid-off
good length outside off, slides straight through as he lunges forward to defend this. Beaten on the outside edge. Chase is interested, but he's alone
good length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket
good length outside off, quickly down on his knee and gets the bat nicely on top of this sweep. Finds deep square
short and wide outside off, punched off the back foot to find sweeper
good length outside off, thick outside edge on the forward block
full at off stump, driven on the up to mid-off
back of a length, skids through at shin height outside off. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
short one at middle stump, pulled straight to deep midwicket
back of a length at leg stump, tucked off the pads to deep square
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at off stump, straight through off the pitch, pushed to cover
tossed up at off stump, inside edge onto pad on the forward press
floated wide and full outside off, sliced to sweeper cover's right
good length outside off, slides in to take the inside edge as he defends
full outside off, thick outside edge to backward point as he drives on the up
good length at off stump, forward defence

good length, off stump, forward defence
full at off stump, driven to short extra

length at off stump, pushed into the covers on the up
full at off stump, defended into the off side
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
regal. Nicely in the slot for the cover drive and he duly dispatches it. Tossed up nice and full and the foot was there, along with the balance and the high elbow, as he hammed this wide of mid-off
good length outside off, swept to deep square
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at off stump, pushed back down the pitch off the front foot
good length at off stump, forward block
short outside off, pulled past midwicket with rapid hands
tossed up outside off, driven straight to mid-off
length outside off, driven to mid-off again
back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, forward block
tossed up at off, driven to mid-off
length at off stump, forward defence
back of a length outside off, guided off the face to backward point
good length outside off, defended into the covers
short one outside off, pulled to midwicket off the inside half
yorker at off stump, tapped into the covers
tossed up at middle stump, driven to mid-on's left. He puts in a dive to parry it to mid-off
good length outside off, left alone
tossed up outside off, finds midwicket with a big heave across the line
back of a length, spinning in at off stump. Defended pitch-side
tossed up outside off, puts in a big stride to fetch it and places the slog sweep, along the floor, to the midwicket boundary
good length at off stump, forward defence
good length outside off, spins back in as he lets it go

back of a length at middle stump, flicked to deep square
full at off stump, pushed back down the pitch
good length outside off, stabbed to backward point off the front foot
short and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot

full outside off, stretches out for it to get underneath for the lap sweep. Manages to get it wide of long leg and hares back before putting in a slide to complete the second run. That's the series for England
